q: Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. "Just get your swagger back," Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what Elgin Baylor did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night

Steve Ballmer sought to differentiate Microsoft's mobile platform from its competitors, referencing the company's "smart design" philosophy which guided the operating system. For the last few years the market has been swamped by phones of similar designs, Steve Ballmer said. "People want a phone that makes info more accessible and helps them complete basic tasks more easily. With smart design, we're trying to go about improving that experience." He

as a radio talk-show host, he started a TV show in 1995. Although Mike Pence was inspired by Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his "no personal attacks" pledge. Conservative media, including Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences, Mike Pence told The Indianapolis Star in 1995.
